resources.string:
Click one of the buttons below to try and connect. There are four default settings:
 1. Standard HTTPS Connection to a trusted site (https://www.google.com)
 2. Attempting to connect to a self-signed certificate that isn't already in the keystore (this should FAIL).
 3. Connecting using our very special generated BKS which has ONLY self-signed certificate in it.
 4. Trying to connect to https://www.google.com with our keychain (this should FAIL).
